replies.msg:
是咁的，外國有人將千本櫻呢首歌譯左唱得的英文，聽著有感而發，就三次創作了。始終係首有悼念意味的歌。
（有歌詞）
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cdYKj2PvnZE&list=WL&index=2&t=0s
以下係比我三創的版本：
With a bold and sudden calling,
Revolution o’ our time starting
Let your hearts be open to it,
“Pacifist” nation
Riding on a folding-scooter, it's the flag of our home rising
Withering white Bauhinia in the freezing wind

On the train tracks, running along the line,
“let us move forward. Don't look behind.”
Boys and girls becoming like samurai
just like those from our previous life

Thousands of cherry blossoms dwindling in the night
Though I can't hear your voice, keep what I say in mind –
This bouquet that surrounds is iron prison, see,
Looking down at us from concentration camps
Darkness has just engulfed the universe we know
The lament that you sing can't reach ears anymore
We are still far away from reaching clear blue skies
Go ahead, defending, with umbrella, lead!

Teens who have trained through struggles are now frontliners in battle
Here and there, we see citizens in procession
This one, that one, doesn't matter,
every single person gathers
March on to our early deaths now!
1, 2, 3, 4
Passing through the gates on the mountain peaks,
Escaping this world, just for that 5 demands.
Surely this will end in a denouement
Among the crowds giving their applause

Thousands of cherry blossoms dwindling in the night
Though I can't hear your voice, keep what I say in mind –
This bouquet that surrounds is iron prison, see,
Looking down at us from that big tyranny
Darkness has just engulfed the universe we know
The lament that you sing can't reach ears anymore
We are still far away from reaching peaks of hope
Go ahead, go protests, here’s your gas mask!

On the train tracks, running along the line,
“let us move forward. Don't look behind.”
Boys and girls becoming like samurai
just like those from our previous life

Thousands of cherry blossoms dwindling in the night
Though I can't hear your voice, keep what I say in mind –
This bouquet that surrounds is iron prison, see,
Leaping down to us from that giant dragon
Thousands of cherry blossoms dwindling in the light
Once your song can be heard, we'll dance with all our might
This bouquet that surrounds is iron prison, see,
Defending our neighbor, wear a helmet, go!

算了，不如我自己再填粵語詞算了。

高官 一聲「我要送中」
敢 走這中化路向
特首一句「我好打得」
不會退讓

二百萬人 齊湧上街
以死相諫 一跳明志
聚集煲底 頌唱讚歌
不撤不退

車轆滾轉 港鐵沿線
兩方交戰 干諾道中
元朗鄉市 黑幫群聚
棍棒交加 報警不應

溶入冥暗倒影 是血沾的紫荊
盈耳吶喊之聲 未可得到答應
任那刀手喧囂 枉穿一身白衣
紫荊花終凋萎 漫長寒夜中

太子處處皆兵 烈似煎蒸沸鼎
地鐵一片哀聲 FA不得進去
夢裡處處金輝 在醉中不覺醒
故以槍口光線 令人類震驚

硝煙飛散繁華夜街
警官驍勇的武士舞
星火燒起燃亮各區
開花遍地

不分正邪 淚彈四飛
高官邀功 想靠血造
死者之痛 成就惡者
高薪厚祿

忽有一天 有哨兵落樓下
回到歸屬 安息樂土
終焉章節 會掃清是迷霧
罪滿哀都 聚滿哀悼

溶進冥暗倒影 是血沾的紫荊
盈耳叫喊哭聲 未可得到見證
盈耳叫喊哭聲 自新屋嶺密室
「惟願高天肯聽 眾生斷魂詠」

原本繁榮香江 烈似煎於沸鼎
浮世處處淒清 願高天肯報應
遙遠處那青空 未可映於眼睛
就以火光彈去 令紅日覺醒

莘莘新血 少壯不懼強權
戴上口罩 加上頭盔
車轆滾轉 各公路橋上
前往CU 再去Poly

溶進冥暗倒影 是血沾的紫荊
沒有結果的花 何必使它綻放
遙遠處那京都 在醉中不覺醒
洋紫荊花終會 在寒夜萎凋

溶進冥暗倒影 是血沾的紫荊
祈盼唱奏歌聲 爲新生者作慶
願那血浸土中 又再新生嫩枝
在這東方之珠 苛政永不興
